Avoid extra trailing whitespace in stdout mode

Not only does `console.log()` already print a newline after its output,
but it prints a space between each of its arguments, so including `'\n'`
as a second argument results in a trailing space, then a newline, then
another newline. Excluding this extra `'\n'` results in just one newline
after the data.

Do not print statistics when using in stdout mode

When using the `stdout` output mode (e.g. using `svgo -` within a
pipeline), the time and optimization statistics shouldn't be printed in
the output stream.

https://github.com/svg/svgo/issues/156

Add lcov.info to npmignore.

lcov.info's presence (in the npm package) confuses Drupal 7, which
interprets any .info file inside of a Drupal theme or Drupal module to
be a Drupal sub-theme or Drupal sub-module.

Drupal themes are increasingly using grunt and grunt plugins, and this
npm package is used by at least grunt-grunticon.

This issue manifests itself in Drupal as a menu rebuild failing when
clearing caches.
moveGroupAttrsToElems now applies transforms to sub-groups & text.
Fix issue with convertPathData when sequential h or l movements are in the opposite direction.
Updated applyTransforms to optionally apply path transforms & convert the stroke-width when a line is scaled uniformly (ie, no skew).
Updated mergePaths to join paths with the same attributes & values.

Possible solution to issue #132 with test cases.

collapse group would merge transforms without respect for clipPath.
